DOC.criteria: Male female , age 18 60 year , inclusive . Body mass index 19.0 35.0 kg/m2 Intact normal skin without potentially obscure tattoo , pigmentation , lesion upper back area intend infusion Free clinically significant abnormality basis medical/medication history physical examination Vital sign clinical laboratory parameter within normal range , outside normal range , deem clinically significant Negative urine drug alcohol screen . Upper back pathology could interfere study outcome . History congestive heart failure , know coronary heart disease , active recent pulmonary disease , renal insufficiency . Rales lung auscultation . Known allergy hyaluronidase ingredient formulation hylenex recombinant Treatment furosemide , benzodiazepine , phenytoin . Pregnancy breastfeed . Exposure experimental drug within 30 day prior study admission , previous participation study . Any reason , investigator 's opinion , would prevent safe participation study .
